name: arc-ai-mini
description: Minimal full-stack prototype demonstrating packet flow across mini and main hubs.

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix services/mini_hub && npm install --prefix services/main_hub && npm install --prefix services/person_b && npm install --prefix web
